get.summary: API to display total count of IDs generated

post.summary: API to display total count of IDs Generated for SPECIFIED DATE

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Specify the date in YYYY/MM/DD format

post.summary: API to display total IDs Generated for a defined range of Date and Time.
post.description: The API accepts Start date,time and End date,time . It returns the total IDs generated between the defined range of Date and Time.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start (From) Date and Time . Value MUST be specified in ISO (use .toISOString() to convert)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End (To) Date and Time . Value MUST be specified in ISO (use .toISOString() to convert)
